## Compliance Assessment

[Structured evaluation against specific standards or criteria]

### Compliance Checklist

| Item | Requirement | Status | Notes |
|------|-------------|--------|-------|
| 1 | [Requirement description] | ✅ Pass | [Brief note] |
| 2 | [Requirement description] | ⚠️ Warning | [Brief note] |
| 3 | [Requirement description] | ❌ Fail | [Brief note] |

### Compliance Score

**Overall Score**: X/10 or X%

**Breakdown:**

- **Category 1**: Score/Status
- **Category 2**: Score/Status
- **Category 3**: Score/Status

### Score Interpretation

| Score Range | Status | Description |
|-------------|--------|-------------|
| 9-10 | ✅ Excellent | Production ready, minimal issues |
| 7-8 | ⚠️ Good | Generally compliant, minor improvements needed |
| 5-6 | ⚠️ Fair | Moderate issues, action required |
| 0-4 | ❌ Poor | Critical issues, significant work needed |
